DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effect in the post operative period of early feeding (4 hours after surgery) vs. traditional management (feeding 12 hours after surgery) in uncomplicated cesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: Early Oral Feeding Versus Traditional Postoperative Care After Cesarean Section.
DOC.criteria: Cesarean section with regional anesthesia, regardless of gestational age. Use of magnesium sulphate General anesthesia Pre gestational or gestational diabetes Bowel injury during surgery
